alert.note: Alert for Butts; Clarke; Greene; Henry; Jasper; Morgan; Newton; Oconee; Rockdale; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 6:34PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Rockdale, Oconee, Morgan, central Clarke, southern Henry, eastern Walton, central Butts, northern Jasper and Newton Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 634 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Eastville to Oxford to Atlanta Motor Speedway, and moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McDonough, Monroe, Covington, Jackson, Madison, Watkinsville, Athens, Hampton, Locust Grove, Social Circle, Oxford, Porterdale, Winterville, Bogart, Rutledge, Newborn, North High Shoals, Mansfield, Jenkinsburg and Bostwick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Butts; Clarke; Greene; Henry; Jasper; Morgan; Newton; Oconee; Rockdale; Walton
